SEARCH
Module info.jab.fp.util
Package info.jab.fp.util

Interface Result<T>

Type Parameters:
T - the type of the value
All Known Implementing Classes:
Result.Failure, Result.Success
public sealed interface Result<T> permits Result.Success<T>, Result.Failure<T>
A sealed interface representing a computation that may either result in a value (success) or an exception (failure).
Author:
Juan Antonio Bre√±a Moral, ChatGPT-40

    Interface
    Description
    static interface 
    Result.CheckedSupplier<T>
    A functional interface representing a supplier that may throw an exception.
    static final record 
    Result.Failure<T>
    Record representing a failed Result in the Result.
    static final record 
    Result.Success<T>
    Record representing a successful Result in the Result.

      Creates a failed Result with the given exception.

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      a failed Result

    • success

      static <T> Result<T> success(T value)
      Creates a successful Result with the given value.
      Type Parameters:
      T - the type of the value
      Parameters:
      value - the value
      Returns:
      a successful Result

    • isSuccess

      boolean isSuccess()
      Checks if the Result is successful.
      Returns:
      true if successful, false otherwise

    • isFailure

      boolean isFailure()
      Checks if the Result is a failure.
      Returns:
      true if a failure, false otherwise

    • ifSuccess

      void ifSuccess(Consumer<T> consumer)
      Performs the given action if the Result is successful.
      Parameters:
      consumer - the action to be performed

    • ifFailure

      void ifFailure(Consumer<Throwable> consumer)
      Performs the given action if the Result is a failure.
      Parameters:
      consumer - the action to be performed

    • getValue

      Optional<T> getValue()
      Returns the value if present, otherwise returns an empty Optional.
      Returns:
      an Optional with the value or empty if failure

    • getException

      Optional<Throwable> getException()
      Returns the exception if present, otherwise returns an empty Optional.
      Returns:
      an Optional with the exception or empty if success

    • getOrElse

      T getOrElse(Supplier<? extends T> other)
      Returns the value if the Result is successful, otherwise returns the result of the specified Supplier.
      Parameters:
      other - a Supplier whose result is returned if the Result is a failure
      Returns:
      the value if the Result is successful, otherwise the result of the Supplier

    • map

      <U> Result<U> map(Function<? super T,? extends U> mapper)
      Applies the given function to the value if the Result is successful and returns a new Result.
      Type Parameters:
      U - the type of the value of the new Result
      Parameters:
      mapper - the function to apply to the value
      Returns:
      a new Result with the mapped value if successful, otherwise the original failure

    • fold

      <U> U fold(U initialValue, Function<? super T,U> folder)
      Reduces the Result to a single value by applying a function to the successful value or a default value if the result is a failure.
      Type Parameters:
      U - the type of the folded value
      Parameters:
      initialValue - the initial value to use if the result is a failure
      folder - the function to apply to the successful value or the initial value
      Returns:
      the folded value

    • flatMap

      <U> Result<U> flatMap(Function<? super T,Result<U>> mapper)
      Applies the given function to the value if the Result is successful and returns a new Result. The function should return a new Result.
      Type Parameters:
      U - the type of the value of the new Result
      Parameters:
      mapper - the function to apply to the value
      Returns:
      the Result returned by the mapper if successful, otherwise the original failure

    • recover

      Result<T> recover(Function<? super Throwable,? extends T> mapper)
      Applies the given function to the exception if the Result is a failure and returns a new Result with the mapped value.
      Parameters:
      mapper - the function to apply to the exception
      Returns:
      a new Result with the mapped value if failure, otherwise the original success

    • recoverCatching

      Result<T> recoverCatching(Function<? super Throwable,Result<T>> mapper)
      Applies the given function to the exception if the Result is a failure and returns a new Result. The function should return a new Result.
      Parameters:
      mapper - the function to apply to the exception
      Returns:
      the Result returned by the mapper if failure, otherwise the original success

    • runCatching

      static <T> Result<T> runCatching(Result.CheckedSupplier<T> supplier)
      Executes the given supplier and returns a Result. If the supplier throws an exception, it returns a failed Result with the thrown exception.
      Type Parameters:
      T - the type of the value
      Parameters:
      supplier - the supplier to execute
      Returns:
      a successful Result if the supplier succeeds, otherwise a failed Result
